events.title: Marie Antoinette marries the Dauphin of France, Louis-Auguste

movie.title: Marie Antoinette
movie.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

movie.title: The Dam Busters
movie.plot: The story of the conception of a new British weapon for smashing the German dams in the Ruhr industrial complex and the execution of the raid by 617 Squadron 'The Dam Busters'.

events.title: two nuclear bombs are detonated on the same day, by the US and USSR

movie.title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
movie.plot: British reporters suspect an international cover-up of a global disaster in progress... and they're right. Hysterical panic has engulfed the world after the United States and the Soviet Union simultaneously detonate nuclear devices and have caused the orbit of the Earth to alter, sending it hurtling towards the sun.
movie.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.

movie.title: Man on the Moon
movie.plot: The story of the life and career of eccentric avant-garde comedian, Andy Kaufman.
movie.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 24 nominations.
